Phosex<tm tmtype="reg"/> tablets Indications and dose

Hyperphosphataemia

By mouth

  • Adult

    Initially 1 tablet 3 times a day, to be taken with meals, dose to be adjusted according to serum-phosphate concentration, usual dose 4–6 tablets daily in divided doses, (1 or 2 tablets with each meal); maximum 12 tablets per day.

 Directions for administration

Phosex tablets are taken with meals.

Tablets can be broken to aid swallowing, but not chewed (bitter taste).
Patient and carer advice

Patients or carers should be given advice on how to administer Phosex tablets.
